name: 數學教學實習（二）（IB）
description: Accompanying the course " Teaching Practicum: Mathematics (II)." This course requires pre-service teachers in IME (IBEC program) take an additional credit (one session, 50-minute). For this credit, they need to further demonstrate micro-teaching with the use of teaching materials (e.g., mathematics textbooks, handouts, …) of IBDP, observe high school mathematics classes in IB schools, and have their one-month practicum in IB schools.
goals: To experience mathematics teaching and learning situations in contexts of regular senior high schools and of IBDP schools
To advance the competences to realize teaching and learning theories in teaching practice under the consideration of real-life contexts
To flexibly implement a variety of teaching skills
To cultivate professional disposition of mathematics education
